TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExcludePathInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> instances.
Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to exclude from searches.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the file system path to exclude from searches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of the `path` parameter becomes the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
Docs.value: The file system directory path that should be excluded from searches.
